agenda_items.title: Various civil, electrical and infrastructure works
agenda_items.details: Includes repairing transformers, maintenance of quarter complex, auditorium, Substation, renovation of flag stand, construction of security sheds, library roof maintenance, partitions, water supply system, canteen, courtyard improvements, guard room construction, laboratory extensions, seepage protection works, barbed wire fencing, substitute items for boys hostel, AC installations, transformer oil procurement, HT/LT line extensions, supply of electrical appliances, system strengthening, electrification works in Medical Unit, Workshop, Procurement of batteries, seminar hall systems, supply of electrical materials, LED fittings, external electrification in Main/Auxiliary Gate, etc. Each work has a BWC decision (approval, ratification, or referral to purchase section) and corresponding action taken (tendering process, awarding work, or work completion).
